purpose: Provides general NixOS configuration applied to all systems.
integration_points: Sets up Nix with flakes and caches
notes: This is the base configuration for all NixOS systems in the repository. It imports various modules for locales, users, environments, and services. Defines a build-all script for CI-like functionality, sets up monitoring with Prometheus, configures Nix with experimental features and trusted caches, enables journald and rsyslogd logging, and sets up KMS console for headless systems. Reasoning: Serves as a common foundation ensuring consistent system behavior, security, and monitoring across all machines.
